```{r load packages}

```{r load data}
df = read.delim("./Data/nhwsdata.txt") |>
   mutate(across(c(DESEX,DBDX, DBTYPE, DBRX, DBIN), ~factor(.)))
df |> skimr::skim()
```

```{r}
numeric_features = c("BMI", "BP", "DEAGE","GH","MCS", "MH","PCS","PF", "RE","RP","RUHP6Q","SF")
categorical_features =c("DESEX", "BP", "DEAGE")
```

```{r}
